ModMetaData.name: [SYR] Processor Framework - Vanilla Expanded Cooking
ModMetaData.author: Daemon976
ModMetaData.description:
Conversion of Vanilla Cooking Expanded's Cheeses and Soups to Processor Framework. Includes support for the Stews and Sushi addons if they are installed.
Includes support for the following mod cheeses if they are installed. Alpha Animals Vanilla Factions Expanded - Insectoids Vanilla Genetics Expanded
